npcs.name: Lilia Windpetal
npcs.personality: Calculating, deeply connected to ancient Vistani traditions, values bloodline legacy above all

appearance.uniqueFeature: an intricate tattoo visible on their neck

npcs.notes: Met: Never. High-ranking member of Children of the Mist cult. Believes Tulip is crucial to 'the Restoration of Barovia and Renewal of the Hero'. Building intelligence networks to locate and retrieve Tulip.

npcs.name: Baron Windpetal
npcs.personality: Ambitious, fiercely loyal to the cult, prone to arrogance
npcs.notes: Met: Never. High-ranking member of Children of the Mist cult. Works with Lilia to retrieve Tulip.

npcs.name: Elmer Windpetal
npcs.personality: Kind, protective of family, uncomfortable with civilization
npcs.notes: Met: Honeywall, Windpetal Herbalist Shop (Session 1). Aware of family Vistani heritage. Trying to protect Tulip by planning to flee to New Barovia. Heading NORTH to Night Hag Sisters after Session 2.

npcs.name: Rosemary Windpetal
npcs.personality: Gentle, natural healer, protective of the innocent

appearance.uniqueFeature: a pet always on their shoulder

npcs.notes: Met: Honeywall, Windpetal Herbalist Shop (Session 1). Gave Tulip a magical necklace before parting. Heading NORTH to Night Hag Sisters after Session 2.

npcs.name: Grizelda
npcs.personality: Patient beyond measure, collector of secrets, excellent listener
npcs.notes: Met: Thornwick forest (Session 2). Green-skinned witch who offered safety with blood bond. Performed ritual to help Wattson recover memories. Knows about Bayle's curse on Rooster.

npcs.name: Akmenos
npcs.personality: Obsessed with knowledge, morally flexible, haunted by the past
npcs.notes: Met: Never (only revealed in memory). Warlock who saved Arkus Vistanavich's soul 115 years ago and bound it to mechanical construct (Wattson). Used forbidden magic. True creator of Wattson. Left message for Wattson: 'When the Hero returns and darkness stirs, you will feel the pull. Seek me then, and I will unlock what was hidden to protect you.'

npcs.name: Egos the Gnome
npcs.personality: Trust issues, morally flexible, skilled negotiator
relationships: Works for Children of the Mist
npcs.notes: Met: Port Majula (Session 0). Replaced Wattson's power gem. Reinforced false Mycroft memories and added subtle programming. Working for Children of the Mist.

npcs.name: Captain Varek Stormclaw
npcs.personality: Honest to bluntness, values strength and courage, respects worthy opponents

appearance.uniqueFeature: a distinctive scar across their cheek

npcs.notes: Met: Honeywall town square (Session 2). Captain of Honeywall Militia. Touched Rooster to check on him during comatose screaming - the screams killed him instantly, mind shattered by relentless voices. DECEASED.

npcs.name: Lysandera
npcs.personality: Mysterious, restless spirit, knows many languages
npcs.notes: Met: Port Majula (Session 0). Elven woman who seemed to recognize Wattson intimately. Asked if he had 'received the message'. Promised to meet him in Sherlock once message arrives, then vanished mysteriously.

npcs.name: Madame Velora Nightwhisper

appearance.uniqueFeature: jewelry that jingles when they move

relationships: Priest at Church of the Mindfreak
npcs.notes: Met: Church of the Mindfreak, Honeywall (Session 1). Priest of Criss Angel. Proposed plan to counter David Blaine that proved useless as events spiraled.

npcs.name: David Blaine
npcs.personality: Always has backup plan, excellent liar, values information

appearance.uniqueFeature: eyes that seem to see through illusions

npcs.notes: Met: Honeywall (Session 1). Minor Demigod of Illusions. Had young Vistani assistant named Strahd. Confrontation with Rooster escalated when Rooster challenged him. Assassination attempt made during failed miracle attempt. DECEASED.

npcs.name: Strahd (young)
npcs.notes: Met: Honeywall (Session 1). Young boy assisting David Blaine. Apparent Vistani descent. Present during confrontation.

npcs.name: Thane (Demigod of History)
npcs.personality: Deeply traditional, obsessed with knowledge, archives everything

appearance.uniqueFeature: eyes that hold millennia of knowledge

npcs.notes: Met: Never (killed before Session 1). Demigod of History. Murdered by Bayle the Butcher. Gave ancient book to Tulip before death chronicling her Vistani ancestors. DECEASED.

npcs.name: Ilia
relationships: Original party member who stayed with Strahd
npcs.notes: Met: Never (historical figure from 115+ years ago). One of the original heroes from ancient Curse of Strahd campaign. Stayed with Strahd after the campaign ended. Ancestor to Tulip's mother Lilia.

npcs.name: Arkus Vistanavich
npcs.personality: Values friendship above all, fiercely loyal once earned, haunted by past
relationships: Father of Ana (corrupted by Dark Power)
npcs.notes: Met: This IS Wattson, but identity unknown to party. Legendary Vistani gunslinger from 115 years ago. Lost daughter Ana to Dark Power corruption. Was corrupted himself serving Strahd. Died purified and soul was saved by Akmenos, bound to W47750-N (Wattson). Dying words: 'Avenge me... kill the devil Strahd... and kill that thing that wears my daughter's face...'

npcs.name: Alejandra
relationships: Original party member from 115 years ago
npcs.notes: Met: Never (historical figure). One of the original heroes who fought Arkus/Ana 115 years ago. Fought alongside Akmenos and Ilia.

npcs.name: Bayle the Butcher
npcs.notes: Met: Never directly (killed before Session 1). Serial killer created/corrupted by Strahd to be vessel for Rahadin's soul. Each soul claimed fed Rahadin's reconstruction over 100 years. Was 99% complete - one blood moon away from transformation. Rooster killed him mid-transformation during final phase. Rooster took his head as trophy. DECEASED.

npcs.name: Rahadin
npcs.notes: Met: Never (died 250+ years ago, spirit in Rooster). Strahd's most loyal and capable servant - chamberlain, strategist, enforcer. Died fighting heroes in original Curse of Strahd campaign. Strahd spent 100 years using Bayle to reconstruct his soul. Rooster killed Bayle at 99% completion - Rahadin's completed spirit leaked into Rooster. At next blood moon (2-4 weeks), transformation will complete and Rooster's soul will be overwritten.

towns.name: Honeywall
towns.localTension: Power vacuum after David Blaine's death
towns.notes: Met: Sessions 1-2. Where the party split after Captain Varek's death and accusations against Tulip. Windpetal Herbalist Shop run by Elmer and Rosemary. David Blaine operated here before assassination.

towns.name: Port Majula
towns.notes: Met: Session 0. Where Wattson had his power gem replaced by Egos. Where Lysandera approached Wattson asking about 'the message'.

towns.name: Thornwick
towns.notes: Met: Session 2. Where Wattson fell down a hill after fleeing Honeywall. Grizelda found him here and offered sanctuary with blood bond. Performed memory ritual here.
